faq.pool_hours: The pool is open from 7 AM to 8 PM.
faq.restaurant: Open Sesame serves Mediterranean cuisine until 11:30 PM.
faq.gym: The gym is open 24/7 and includes free weights and machines.
faq.spa: Wellbeings Spa is open from 10 AM to 10 PM. Appointments recommended.
faq.wifi: Wi-Fi is complimentary throughout the hotel. Connect to 'Indigo_Guest'.
faq.pets: Yes, we are pet-friendly! Please inform reception if you're bringing a pet.
